name: QAOA for MaxCut
description: Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm (p=1) for MaxCut on a 4-node cycle graph.
long_description: QAOA is a variational hybrid quantum-classical algorithm for combinatorial optimization. It alternates between a problem Hamiltonian (phase separator) and a mixing Hamiltonian. This circuit implements p=1 QAOA for the MaxCut problem on a 4-node cycle graph (edges: 0-1, 1-2, 2-3, 3-0) with γ=0.5 (phase) and β=0.3 (mixing). The parameters should be classically optimized to maximize the expected cut value.
expected_output: Probability distribution peaked on good MaxCut partitions (depends on γ, β)

references.title: Farhi, Goldstone, Gutmann (2014). A Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm. arXiv:1411.4028

author: OpenQC Community
